attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We have thousands of people signing petitions everyday.

I thought this was created so you could listen to the public and what we want, you give general or vague responses to a petition.

If a petition asks you to not go ahead with something, although its obvious the british public do not wish for it to go ahead, you simply respond along the lines of if would be in the countries long term interest or explaining what you have already done but are going ahead with it anyway.

If we, the British public have asked for it not to go ahead why will you not listen to us. It's our country, it's our money you are spending.

What we ask is that you listen to us.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
